name: Bones in the Boneyard
description:
There are many bones in the boneyard. As they fall from the screen, arrange skulls in lines of three to clear them and line up complete skeletons to set them free.

Happy Halloween! 

Game includes four modes:

  • NORMAL MODE: Clear three skeletons
  • HARD MODE: Clear three skeletons with added difficulty
  • ENDLESS MODE: Clear as many skeletons and blocks as possible for a high score
  • PUZZLE MODE: Complete all skeletons in specially designed boneyard puzzles, three stages in total
